text.破天荒なちびっこ学園理事長・秋川の宣言で\\n設立された新レース<color=#: With an outrageous declaration, young academy chairwoman Akikawa establishes a new race — <color=#FF6D26>URA Finals</color>! Trainers and horsegirls work hand in hand to become its maiden champion!
text.チームで団結！ 新たな青春！ ……と、\\n急遽始まったチーム対抗戦<color: Team up! A new experience awaits! …So began the sudden new team battle — <color=#FF6D26>Aoharu Hai</color>. But before the fun can start the academy faces a crisis!? Stand united and claim victory to save the freedoms of Tracen Academy!
text.メディア主導で設立された新レース\\n<color=#FF6D26>『トゥインク: A new race established by the media, <color=#FF6D26>"Twinkle Star Climax"</color>. A battle to determine the strongest! Run towards your own climax, chasing your dreams!
